FUNCTION GET_SEGMENT_VALUE(STRCT NUMBER,SEG NUMBER,SEGID NUMBER) RETURN VARCHAR2 IS

--- IT IS TYPICALLY CALLED FOR GETTING A SINGLE SEGMENT VALUE (ACCOUNTING SEGMENT)
---
--- PARAMETERS DETAIL:-
--- 
--- STRCT  -->  STRUCTURE_ID
--- SEG    -->  THE SEGMENT NUMBER 
--- SEGID  -->  THE SEGMENT VALUE ID FOR WHICH THE DESCRIPTION IS REQUIRED
---------------------------

RET VARCHAR2(1000);
BEGIN

		IF SEG=1 THEN

				FROM WIZ_SEGMENT01
				WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = STRCT AND
							SEGMENT_ID = SEGID ;
